publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4577 Sandra White: Glasgow’s Miles Better—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that Glasgow is to be part of the world’s biggest trial of environmentally friendly vehicles, which will see 40 electric cars tested in the city over 12 months with the data being analysed by the University of Strathclyde in order to how best to roll out the use of environmentally-friendly vehicles in the future, and hopes that Glasgow City Council’s admirable aims will be represented in any future transport summit. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Rob Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-4577 Glasgow’s Miles Better (lodged on 7 July 2009) Mike Pringle*, Christina McKelvie*, Gil Paterson*
